text: Paradise is an incorporated town in Butte County, California. It is located in the Sierra Nevada near the northeastern Sacramento Valley. The population was 26,283 in 2013, but only 4,764 at the 2020 census. The town is statistically classified within the Chico Metropolitan Area. The town was destroyed by the Camp Fire in November 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ontheridge.com: Paradise history + geography * Paradise Ridge Chamber of Commerce website Category:Towns in California Category:Settlements in Butte County, California
title: Paradise, California
